GSD.description:
cifs: fix oops during encryption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit fe6ea044c4f05706cb71040055b1c70c6c8275e0. For more details please see the references link.
